text: is a Japanese former international table tennis player. Born in Shōnai, Saito represented Japan in table tennis at the 1988 Summer Olympics. In the singles event he went 5–2 in the group stage, but missed out on qualifying for the knockout rounds, finishing third in his group. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male table tennis players Category:Olympic table tennis players of Japan Category:Table tennis players at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in table tennis Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Table tennis players at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Table tennis players at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Yamagata Prefecture
title: Kiyoshi Saito (table tennis)
